subject: Simsonn Plus X issues.
description_text:
Hello, 

 
We have recently purchased a set of Simsonn Plus X pedals from your AliExpress store.
 
We are trying to set them up and they are recognised in Simsonn Manager 2.0.8 and we are able to calibrate them but they are not recognised in game when we are trying to assign throttle, break and clutch in game settings.
 

 
We have tried both "Combined" and "Separate" setting on Project Cars 2, for example and still not recognised.
 

 
Just wondering if you can help.
 

 
Kind regards,
 

 
Brad.

conversations.body_text: 你好，itsit。  我们在测试过程中没有遇到任何问题。 能否请您提供一段视频，展示 2.0.8 版本中从 0% 到 100% 的踏板测试？ 另外，请发送一段显示绑定问题的视频，以便我们协助您解决问题。
